data.description:
Enter the fifth dimension of golf! Developed in partnership with R&A, DP World Tour, and Me and My Golf, this immersive challenge will take your swing to new heights.

Golf 5 will appeal to beginners who want to hone their skills in practice modes, experienced players looking to improve their game by analyzing their swing data, and anyone who simply wants to have fun. High Precision Control (HPC©) faithfully captures real swings in an ultra-realistic HD environment and immersive atmosphere.

Play solo or online with friends from anywhere. Compete in tournaments, earn G5, and climb the International eGolf Federation rankings to become a Master.

⛳4 free original courses: Dunes, Forest, Tropical, 3 pin positions each, and Safari.

🏛️4 paid DLC world-class real courses: the iconic Royal County Down NEW! and Royal Troon, with 3-pin positions, Hoylake, and Old Course - St Andrews. More courses to come!

🏌🏼Play in practice modes. Rounds of 9 or 18 holes solo or against the AI Club Pro. Online tournaments and matches. Match, stroke, or Stableford scoring.

🪙Place in tournaments and earn G5 coins to get game content.

📈XTi©: exclusive Pro Launch Manager to analyze your swing progress.

🔝Driving Range to warm up or compete.

🚩Putting Green: Sharpen your short game.

⏱️WiPp: A fun and fast play mode.

🎯Minigolf: Relax and enjoy.

Also

🛒2 Callaway free sets. 3 club sets to buy. 🛩Drone View. 🍃Wind. 🦯Compatible with VR golf club handlers. 🌍Multilingual. 👥3D Avatar, multi-user, mobile app… And more!
